title: Which crops grow faster in the summer season? - Quora

response.answer_text: Top 30 Summer Flowering Plants grow in summer season 1. Lilies 2. Blanket Flower 3. Gloriosa Daisy 4. Musk Rose 5. Marigold 7. Roses 8. Bougainvillea 9. Dahlia 10. Sunflower 11. Coreopsis 12. Yarrow 13. Chrysanthemums 14. Beardtongue 15. Pineapple Lily 16. Daffodils 17. Zinnia 18. Lotus 19. Globe Amaranth 20. Oxalis 21. Perennial Hibiscus 22. Petunias 23. Sea Holly 24. Coralbells 25. Peony 26. Plumeria 27. Pansy 28. Daylily 29. Purple Coneflower 30. Lavender Top 20 vegetables grow in summer season 1.Chilli 2.Beans 3.Tomatoes 4.Summer Squash 5.Corns 6.Cucumbers 7.Bitter Gourd 8.Cauliflower 9.Lady’s finger 10.Brinjal 11.Pumpkin 12.Celery (cold climates) 13.Eggplant 14.Muskmelons 15.Peppers 16.Pumpkins 17.Sweet potato (needs long, hot, frost-free season) 18.Watermelon 19.Radishes 20.Carrots
